body.raw:
WITH current_works
  AS (SELECT per_id, job_code
        FROM works
       WHERE sysdate >= start_date
         AND (sysdate < end_date
              OR end_date IS NULL))
SELECT person_name
  FROM person
       INNER JOIN current_works
       ON person.per_id = current_works.per_id
       INNER JOIN job
       ON current_works.job_code = job.job_code
          AND comp_id = ${comp_id}

request.description: Returns all entities from the database.
